sentences.english: Is there a name for Asian women who like white guys?
sentences.chinese: 对喜欢白人男性的亚裔女性有没有什么雅称？

sentences.english: Italian Sausage elegantly called "Salami", the shape of long thick rounded rolling pin.
sentences.chinese: 意大利肉肠雅称“莎乐美”，形似粗长滚圆的擀面杖。

sentences.english: The Name of the Ku Jie Jun appears in the Ming Dynasty, is the bamboo tea stove's elegant name.
sentences.chinese: 苦节君之名出现于明代，系竹茶炉的雅称。

sentences.english: Foliage is frog skin shape the white sands, commonly known as "toad back".
sentences.chinese: 叶面呈蛙皮状沙粒白点，雅称“虾蟆背”。

sentences.english: Correspondence is one kind of elegant name being the ancients to the letter.
sentences.chinese: 尺牍，是古人对书信的一种雅称。

sentences.english: This elegant name comes from a legend.
sentences.chinese: 这道汤的雅称来源于一个传说故事。

definition: to dub with a nice-sounding appellation/fanciful moniker
refined appelation/(humor) sb's elegant monicker/(hon.) your esteemed name
... hence the name (used at the end of a sentence)
old term/old way of referring to sth
alternative name/to refer to sth by another name/antonomasia
also known as/alternative name/to also be called
to be famous far and wide (idiom)
to acclaim/to sing the praises of
